attributes.action: look into why some civil service posts must be advertised outside of the civil service itself and not others
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all vacancies within the civil service must be advertised in local job centres and newspapers and not just handed to the person the civil service deems fit.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
